data.text: @MirrorNow It's shame that thousands of our students were in #UkraineÔ∏è and our governments had no knowledge of it .

@MirrorNow Successful management of Covid means 5 million deaths as per US and floating dead bodies in Ganges. Similarly thousands of students struggling without food and shelter waiting for evacuation is called efficient mismanagement.

@MirrorNow How can he lie so blatantly.

The worst performance by a Head of State in managing the #Covid crisis is @narendramodi

Over 40 Lakh died due to Zero preparation or support by the #ModiGovt.

#Modi played Zero role in getting the vaccines available.

@MirrorNow Lies and lies are all he has, to fool you all away.

#GodiMedia

@MirrorNow Jhoot par jhoot, bolthe jao..aur bolo, bolthe raho, zor se bolo phir se bolo..40 lac log died in India due to covid if not more due to mismanagement, students still stranded others evacuated themselves n was flown from frndly countries. Making students attend sunday's modi class.
